name: 5 minute snowflake
notes:
**5-minute crochet snowflake pattern by crochet for you**

this crochet snowflake can make in 5 minutes. also, this pattern requires less than 5 yards.

* small >> #2 – fine / sport weight yarn and g-6, 4mm crochet hook

* the large one crocheted for the video tutorial. #4 – medium / worsted weight yarn (red heart soft, white) and i-9, 5.5mm crochet.
